results.name: Characteristic function of natural numbers with number of divisors equal to a Fibonacci number.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Index entries for sequences computed from exponents in factorization of n
mathematica: fibQ[n_] := IntegerQ@ Sqrt[5*n^2+4] || IntegerQ@ Sqrt[5*n^2-4]; Boole[ fibQ /@ DivisorSigma[0, Range[103]]] (* _Giovanni Resta_, Mar 10 2017 *)
results.author: _Giovanni Teofilatto_, Oct 24 2006
